reviews.customers_say: Customers find the sweater stylish, with one noting its cute tusk-like buttons, and appreciate its flattering fit that compliments curvy figures.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Beautiful color and style
items.body: Such a pretty color and the peplum style makes it complementary to your figure. I’m 5’7” 125# and the small is perfect. I love the 2 buttons and V neck which is not too deep on me but I’m small busted. A tank underneath would look good too if needed for modesty. It doesn’t hang open when I bend over which is a huge plus. The material is soft and not scratchy to me at all. Overall I’m very happy with my purchase. Read more
items.author: Janet porter

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Excellent Quality, True To Size!!
items.body: This sweater is beautiful!! Excellent quality for the price. It’s very soft, well made and came packaged nicely. Fits true to size. I would not normally give my measurements in a review, I barely leave reviews in general but I actually love this sweater and hopefully other plus sized women find this review helpful prior to purchasing. I am a size 14/16 and 5’3” in height. Middle aged, short with belly. Smaller on top with thinner legs but a solid size16 around the middle and hips. I purchased the XL and it’s absolutely perfect. It makes a great cover up sweater when open but doesn’t look too big. Fitted beautifully when buttoned up giving great contour in the waist. I purchased to wear as a cover up if needed over a thin material dress for a special occasion. I’m very impressed and will be purchasing at least 1 more. If you are on the fence, for the price just buy it! Read more
items.author: Customer

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Flattering sweater with ugly buttons
items.body: The sweater itself is wonderful. It’s cute. It’s soft. It fits well and is flattering. I gave it 4 stars because the buttons it comes with are hideous. The buttons aren’t white and they make the sweater look too frumpy. They are shaped bizarrely and are just weird. The good news is that this is an easy fix. You change up the buttons and VIOLA! The sweater is perfect! Read more
items.author: Sean McCarter

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars !!!! Pretty Cardigan Sweater !!!!.
items.body: !!!! Pretty Cardigan Sweater !!!! The Red Color Looks Pretty As The Picture, I Like The Simple But Nice Style, The Two Front Different Big Buttons Detail, The Nice Bottom Peplum Flare Looks Beautiful On, Size Medium Fit Good, Is Well Made, Nice Lightweight Quality Material, Great Value For The Money, I Love This Cardigan Sweater So Much That I Ordered It In More Colors, Thank You For The Nice Early Delivered !!!!. Read more
items.author: Estela

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Style and warmth in a chic cardigan
items.body: First, the caramel color is to dies for. It is a medium thick cardigan that has a body skimming fit. Very comfortable and not snug or tight. Great for ladies with ample bossoms and a bit of a tummy. It is very flattering. It can be dressed up or down and you can layer it. It will be warm, but comfy at the same time. Read more
items.author: Angela Petta

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Bottom hem rolls up
items.body: Looks pretty good on, material is lightweight, and didn't tell whether it could be dried in dryer so air dry i guess? However the bottom hem rolls up even after I ironed it down!! Ugh Read more
items.author: Mandy

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Beautiful sweater
items.body: I ordered a Small. I am 5' 6 1/2 ".....My weight is 121 lbs. I love the color, the fit is not tight, yet not to big. So comfortable. The color of purple is beautiful. Love the bottoms. Read more
items.author: choirgirl

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Nice and soft
items.body: Nice and soft material. Fits great and the color is true. Enjoying it! Read more
items.author: lturner

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

This piece transitions well from daytime plans to evening events with a quick change of shoes and a small bag or clutch.

To keep it looking sharp, follow the care label first and avoid high heat when drying or steaming if the material is sensitive.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: XS, S, M, L, XL.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Brown, Gray, Apricot, Black, Bright White, Coffee, Navy Blue, Gray Blue, Dark Green, Red, Wine Red, Khaki, Pink, White. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
